Erroring, because of cyclical madness!

```{r packages}
library(jagsUI)
```

```{r model}
modfile <- tempfile()
writeLines("
model
{
  N <- sum(f[1:4])  # N = 75 in this example

  p[1:4] ~ ddirch(alpha[])  # prior for proportion - Dirichlet is the multinomial equivalent of beta

  f[1:4] ~ dmulti(p[], N)   # actual proportions drawn from mulinomial distribution
}
           ", con = modfile)
```

```{r data}
data <- list(
  alpha = c(1, 1, 1, 1),
  f = c(24, 32, 10, 9)
)
```

```{r params}
params <- c("")
```

```{r fit}
fit <- autojags(data, inits = NULL, params, modfile, n.chains = 4)
```

```{r plot}
plot(fit)
summary(fit$samples)
```
